newsitem.title: UK: Utd Biscuits completes frozen food sale.
newsitem.headline: Utd Biscuits completes frozen food sale.

text.p: United Biscuits said on Tuesday it had completed the sale of its frozen vegetables unit, Ross Vegetable Products, to RVP foods Ltd for 44 million stg.
The company said it would use the proceeds of the sale to repay borrowings.

On disposal, a proportion of capitalised brand value and the goodwill arising on the original acquisition of Ross Young's in 1988 will be written off, amounting to around 19 million stg and 32 million stg respectively.
The sale follows the reorganisation of United Biscuits' frozen and chilled foods businesses earlier in the year.
In 1995, Ross Vegetable Products had sales of 56.1 million stg and operating profits of 6.2 million stg.
